I can guide you through our platform 'Unbound' powered by Floxus Education!
Offering support for 'Unbound' powered by Floxus Education!

Unbound is a new generation platform built to make everyone's learning experience complete. With a keen focus on building a Product Mindset and a series of Practical Projects and Challenges in different technologies to enhance the developer in you.

patterns: How is Floxus better than Udemy?
How is Floxus better than Internshala?
responses: Floxus is a Tech-ed company focussing on the latest technology, covering a range of courses from Web development to Machine Learning delivered by experts in respective fields.

patterns: How to start with practical projects?
How to start with any project?
How to start working on a project?
How to work on a project?
responses: Industry relevant projects from Web-development to Machine Learning, all on a planned path to bring out the brilliant developer in you! Simply go to the 'Explore Projects' section and select any project you find interesting. And click on 'Start Project' and voila you have started the project! Isn't that simple ;)

These are challenges and hurdles that will not only test you, but would also immensely grow your intuition and problem solving skills. To start simply go to the 'Explore Challenges' section and select any challenge you find interesting. And click on 'Start Challenge' and voila you have started the challenge! Isn't that easy ;)

patterns: When will live challenges be opened
responses: These are specific challenges that would be live and timed out to help you learn to perform your best under pressure. Stay tuned with us for further updates on live challenges!
Click on 'Complete my profile' in the 'Home' page and fill the Education details, Projects and Experience to complete your profile
